version.releaseNotes:
With pleasure, Atlassian presents the Atlassian Connector for IntelliJ IDEA 2.2.0

Highlights of this Release:

  • What's New for JIRA Issues
    • Issue Attachments
    • Multiple Custom Issue Filters
    • Pausing the Timer
  • What's New for Bamboo Builds
    • Bamboo Build History
    • Builds in Progress and in Queue
    • JIRA Issue Links in the Build Window
    • Quick Search
  • What's New for Crucible Reviews
    • Review Comments Marked as Read or Not Read
    • Improved Editor for Custom Filter
    • Click through from Browser to IDEA
  • A lot of Fixes in this Release

Please log your issues, requests and votes. They help us decide what needs doing. It is easy to add an issue. If you do not yet have an account, the system will prompt you to create one.
